item.description:
Important Note: Easy parking is also available just down the street on Garvey Road.  Be sure to park on the ODD numbered side of the street (the right side if you're turning left onto the street from Edmands Rd).  If you park in our driveway, please park as efficiently as possible to allow the maximum number of spaces for people (i.e. 3 cars in front of garage).  Backing into your spot will make it easier to maneuver out once other cars are parked.

Also, our driveway was badly damaged over this winter, so it's a bit "messy" and has some potholes.  We suggest you wear appropriate outdoor footwear, and perhaps bring a flashlight to help you see better as you walk down to the house.

As we always say, "Everything always works out!"  :-)

This evening's topic:

We all LOVE the law of attraction!  Getting it to work the way you want it to can be challenging at times, though.  Right?

To be an effective deliberate creator with the law of attraction, you need to learn how to allow what you want to manifest. This is key to your success, and to your ease and joy.

This evening we'll focus on this art of allowing, and share some processes for shifting beliefs that get in your way of easy manifesting.

Join us for getting to know like-minded people, learning together, masterminding, and maybe even some group coaching. We're eager to build a wonderful supportive, fun, learning community with you!

If you RSVP "yes", please be considerate of Ann and Mark, and either show up, or let us know of your change in plans so we won't be preparing for you, waiting for you or leaving someone on a waiting list unnecessarily. Thank you!
item.how_to_find_us: We're down a long driveway. Look for white mailbox with our name and #276, across from large, old, white house

group.name: "Good Vibrations" Metro West Law of Attraction Community

item.name: The Art of Allowing and Shifting Beliefs That Get in the Way
